attributes.action: Impeachment of Tony Blair for War Crimes
attributes.additional_details:
For the 2003 invasion of Iraq on the basis of evidence of Weapons of Mass Destruction. On further investigation no WMD were found. This led to deaths and casualties of hundreds of thousand of Iraqi civilians and armed forces men and women.
Tony Blair must be made publicly accountable for his decision to take baseless action on incorrect intelligence. And a destabilising effect in the Middle East and continual loss of domestic and foreign lives.
